Class Artist

  • Object
    • Artist

  • public class Artist
extends Object
    Class that represents an artist.
    Author:
    Jon

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Artist.RemoteArtistControl
      Control that allows us to keep track of the number of artists that contain only remote tracks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Artist(String keyName)
      Class constructor specifying the key name (lower case artist name).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Artist

        public Artist(String keyName)
        Class constructor specifying the key name (lower case artist name).

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyName

        public String getKeyName()
        Gets the key name. This is the artist name in lower case.
        Returns:
        lower case artist name

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Gets the display name. This is the first spelling of the artist we encounter.
        Returns:
        artist display name

      • getAltNames

        public List<String> getAltNames()
        Gets the list of alternate artist names. This is a list of the artist names in any case.
        Returns:
        list of alternate artist names

      • getNumLocalTracks

        public Integer getNumLocalTracks()
        Gets the number of local tracks for this artist.
        Returns:
        number of local tracks

      • getNumRemoteTracks

        public Integer getNumRemoteTracks()
        Gets the number of remote tracks for this artist.
        Returns:
        number of remote tracks

      • getTotalLocalTime

        public Integer getTotalLocalTime()
        Gets the total time of local tracks for this artist.
        Returns:
        total time of local tracks

      • getTotalRemoteTime

        public Integer getTotalRemoteTime()
        Gets the total time of remote tracks for this artist.
        Returns:
        total time of remote tracks

      • getRemoteArtistControl

        public Artist.RemoteArtistControl getRemoteArtistControl()
        Gets the remote artist control. This is used to remember that we've accounted for this artist containing both local and remote tracks, and have adjusted the count of remote-only artists accordingly.
        Returns:
        remote artist control

      • setRemoteArtistControl

        public void setRemoteArtistControl(Artist.RemoteArtistControl remoteArtistControl)
        Sets the remote artist control. This is used to remember that we've accounted for this artist containing both local and remote tracks, and have adjusted the count of remote-only artists accordingly.
        Parameters:
        remoteArtistControl - remote artist control

      • addTrackToArtist

        public void addTrackToArtist(Track track)
        Adds a new track to this artist. This involves updating the track and total time values, as well as updating the list of alternate case spellings for the artist name.
        Parameters:
        track - track object

      • toDisplayMap

        public HashMap<String,String> toDisplayMap()
        Returns a hash map of the artist attributes.
        Returns:
        hash map of the artist attributes
